pageHome.mainLine1: Bulk import all your data into
pageHome.mainLine2: ERP ðŸ‘‰ in matter of seconds
pageHome.desc: When it comes to mass-importing data to Daftra ERP, D-Import is your destination. Whether you are a new user to Daftra coming from another system, or you want to sync/upload all your data e.g. your client database into Daftra ERP all at once and without having to worry about how much data you have to transfer .. D-Import is your best assistant to get it done for you.
pageHome.feat2: Tune different settings to fit needs.
pageHome.feat3: Validate your files and check on them before import.
pageHome.feat4: Map your column to Daftra's invoice field.
pageHome.feat5: Use your template or build yours.

settings.mult1: Whether invoices have one item or multiple items.
settings.custom1: Whether you want to store data into your custom fields.
settings.pay1: Whether invoices include payments or not. Possible Options:
settings.pay2: [{Condition: 'Payment Amount = Invoice Total',Status: 'Fully Paid'},{Condition: 'Payment Amount > Invoice Total',Status: 'Partially Paid'},{Condition: 'Payment Amount = 0',Status: 'Not Paid'}]
settings.spacialTax1: Whether you want to use a Spacial Tax in your invoices other than the standard VAT 15% value-added tax
settings.payMethod1: If you want to specify a payment method in your invoices, you should use one of the following values in your excel file (Payment Method Column):
settings.treasury1: If you want to specify a treasury to collect cash, you should use the treasury code/number in Daftra.
settings.newClients1: Wether your invoices will have new (Un-registered) clients on Daftra ERP.
settings.newClients2: By toggling this option On, The App will automatically add the new clients to Daftra and create their profile based on the provided data, then creates their invoice.

upload.tip2: Only 1 file is Allowed, new file will override the old file.

preview.noprev: No Preview, Please Upload Your File.

import.importQuest: If you ready to send your file to Daftra ERP?

steps.two_desc: Map the columns to Daftra's invoices
